title: Spack detects duplicate compiler modules on Piz Daint
body:
When running `spack compiler find` on Piz Daint, Spack detects duplicate entries for `cce`. 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

This issue is reproducible on Piz Daint (CSCS) by:
```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ cd spack
$ . share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack compiler list
==> Available compilers
-- cce cnl7-any -------------------------------------------------
cce@9.0.2  cce@9.0.2  cce@9.0.1  cce@9.0.1  cce@8.7.9

-- gcc cnl7-any -------------------------------------------------
gcc@8.3.0  gcc@8.2.0  gcc@8.1.0  gcc@7.3.0  gcc@6.1.0

-- gcc sles15-x86_64 --------------------------------------------
gcc@7.4.1

-- intel cnl7-any -----------------------------------------------
intel@19.0.1.144  intel@18.0.2.199  intel@18.0.1.163  intel@17.0.4.196

-- pgi cnl7-any -------------------------------------------------
pgi@19.7.0  pgi@19.5.0  pgi@19.4.0
```
As can bee seen in the first line there are duplicate entries for ` cce@9.0.2` and `cce@9.0.1`.

### Error Message

There is no error message, only duplicate entries that stem from an incorrect detection of the versions that are available via module files:
```console
$ module av cce

------------------------------------------------------------ /opt/cray/pe/modulefiles ------------------------------------------------------------
cce/8.7.9          cce/9.0.1          cce/9.0.1-classic  cce/9.0.2(default) cce/9.0.2-classic

```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1444-4b48f7039
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** cray-sles15-haswell

### Additional information
Running compiler detection in debug mode we get:
```console
spack -d compiler find
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:35.739429, 5313] '/bin/bash' '--norc' '--noprofile' '-lc' 'echo $CRAY_CPU_TARGET'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:35.746306, 5313] default to front-end architecture
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:35.792600, 5313] Imported compiler from built-in commands
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:35.794860, 5313] Imported compiler from built-in commands
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.376073, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.377433, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.380151, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.378778, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.381488, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++-7' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.387805, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.392334, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.395216, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.386379, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc-7' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.404775, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.382759, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.389104, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.429171, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++-7' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.435213, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.393870, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '--version'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.449949, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran-7' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.419942, 5313] '/usr/bin/gfortran' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.430545, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.453562, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.451955, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc-7' '-dumpversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.468703, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++-7' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.484837, 5313] '/usr/bin/g++' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.492467, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc-7' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.494332, 5313] '/usr/bin/gcc' '-dumpfullversion'
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.501806, 5313] Couldn't get version for compiler /usr/bin/gfortran-7
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.501930, 5313] Couldn't get version for compiler /usr/bin/gfortran
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.501981, 5313] Couldn't get version for compiler /usr/bin/gfortran-7
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.502022, 5313] Couldn't get version for compiler /usr/bin/gfortran
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.502059, 5313] Error while executing candidate compiler /usr/bin/cc
TypeError: expected string or bytes-like object
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.535807, 5313] Added 18 new compilers to /users/culpo/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml
    pgi@19.7.0  pgi@19.4.0        intel@18.0.2.199  intel@17.0.4.196  gcc@8.2.0  gcc@7.4.1  gcc@6.1.0  cce@9.0.2  cce@9.0.1
    pgi@19.5.0  intel@19.0.1.144  intel@18.0.1.163  gcc@8.3.0         gcc@8.1.0  gcc@7.3.0  cce@9.0.2  cce@9.0.1  cce@8.7.9
==> [2020-06-16-16:43:36.536854, 5313] Compilers are defined in the following files:
    /users/culpo/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml
```

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output

If you want to ask a question about the tool (how to use it, what it can currently do, etc.), try the `#general` channel on our Slack first. We have a welcoming community and chances are you'll get your reply faster and without opening an issue.
